name: Tarun Bommawar
summary: Graduate CS student with experience in NLP, ML, and backend development, focusing on building intelligent tools for resume and job matching.

bullets: Built NLP pipelines in Python to classify customer support tickets.
Trained and evaluated machine learning models using scikit-learn.
Created SQL queries and dashboards to monitor model performance.
Developed REST APIs in Python for internal data tools.
Containerized services using Docker for easier deployment.
Collaborated with a small team using Git and code reviews.

details: Coursework: NLP, Machine Learning, Distributed Systems
